name: The Sea Explorer
summary: Exploring the jaw-dropping US east coast by foot and by boat
description: Embark on a 7-day adventure along the breathtaking U.S. East Coast, combining invigorating hikes with serene boat excursions. Begin your journey in vibrant Miami, exploring the iconic Lummus Park Beach. Venture to the tranquil shores of Islamorada, renowned as the world capital of recreational fishing. Relax on the pristine sands of Sombrero Beach in Marathon, a perfect spot for swimming and snorkeling. Conclude your expedition in the charming ambiance of West Key, immersing yourself in the unique coastal beauty of the Florida Keys. This medium-difficulty tour is ideal for groups up to 15, offering a harmonious blend of exploration and relaxation

name: The Forest Hiker
summary: Breathtaking hike through the Canadian Banff National Park
description: Experience a 5-day journey through Canada's majestic national parks, tailored for nature enthusiasts of all levels. Commence in Banff National Park, traversing old-growth forests and witnessing the awe-inspiring mountain scenery. Proceed to Jasper National Park, where you'll encounter serene lakes and diverse wildlife amidst rugged landscapes. Conclude in the Glacier National Park of Canada, exploring trails that lead to breathtaking glaciers and alpine vistas. This easy-difficulty tour accommodates up to 25 participants, ensuring a memorable and accessible hiking experience.

startLocation.address: 419 S Mill St, Aspen, CO 81611, USA

name: The Snow Adventurer
summary: Exciting adventure in the snow with snowboarding and skiing
description: Dive into a 4-day winter escapade in Aspen, Colorado, designed for thrill-seekers craving snowy excitement. Challenge yourself on the slopes of Aspen Highlands, renowned for its diverse terrain and stunning views. Continue to Beaver Creek, offering world-class skiing and snowboarding opportunities amidst picturesque alpine settings. This difficult-level tour, limited to 10 participants, promises an adrenaline-fueled experience in the heart of the Rocky Mountains.

startLocation.address: 3663 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109, USA

name: The Park Camper
summary: Breathing in Nature in America's most spectacular National Parks
description: Embark on a 10-day camping expedition through America's most spectacular national parks, perfect for nature lovers seeking an immersive experience. Start in Zion Canyon National Park, marveling at towering sandstone cliffs and narrow slot canyons. Journey to Antelope Canyon, famous for its wave-like structures and light beams piercing through narrow openings. Explore the vastness of the Grand Canyon National Park, witnessing one of the world's most iconic natural wonders. Conclude in Joshua Tree National Park, where the Mojave and Colorado deserts converge, creating a unique landscape dotted with Joshua trees and rugged rock formations. This medium-difficulty tour accommodates up to 15 adventurers, offering an unforgettable journey through diverse terrains and ecosystems.

name: The City Wanderer
summary: Living the life of Wanderlust in the US' most beatiful cities
description: Immerse yourself in a 9-day urban exploration of America's most beautiful cities, blending cultural landmarks with vibrant city life. Begin in the bustling streets of New York City, experiencing iconic sites and the city's dynamic atmosphere. Travel to Los Angeles, where entertainment and cultural landmarks await your discovery. Conclude in San Francisco, exploring its historic neighborhoods and the majestic Golden Gate Bridge. This easy-level tour supports up to 20 participants, providing a rich tapestry of urban experiences across the United States.

name: The Sports Lover
summary: Surfing, skating, parajumping, rock climbing and more, all in one tour
description: Set out on a 14-day adrenaline-packed tour across California, tailored for sports enthusiasts seeking diverse challenges. Surf the waves at Point Dume Beach in Malibu, a haven for surfers of all levels. Skate at the renowned Venice Skate Park, immersing yourself in the vibrant skate culture. Experience the thrill of skydiving in San Diego, offering breathtaking aerial views of the coastline. Raft through the rapids of Kern River, known for its exhilarating white-water adventures. Conclude with rock climbing in Yosemite National Park, scaling iconic granite cliffs amidst stunning natural beauty. This difficult-level tour, limited to 8 participants, delivers an unparalleled sports adventure across California's diverse landscapes.

name: The Star Gazer
summary: The most remote and stunningly beautiful places for seeing the night sky
description: Embark on a 9-day celestial journey to some of the most remote and stunningly beautiful stargazing locations. Start at the Natural Bridges National Monument, designated as the first International Dark Sky Park, offering unparalleled night sky views. Visit Horseshoe Bend, where the night sky meets the dramatic bend of the Colorado River, creating a mesmerizing nocturnal panorama. Conclude in Death Valley National Park, one of the darkest skies in the U.S., providing an unobstructed view of the cosmos. This medium-difficulty tour is designed for up to 8 astronomy enthusiasts, promising an enlightening experience under the stars.

name: The Northern Lights
summary: Enjoy the Northern Lights in one of the best places in the world
description: Experience a 3-day expedition to witness the mesmerizing Northern Lights in one of the world's premier viewing locations. Based in Yellowknife, Canada, situated under the auroral oval, it offers some of the most frequent and vivid displays of the Aurora Borealis. Engage in guided nighttime excursions to optimal viewing spots, maximizing your chances of witnessing this natural phenomenon. This easy-level tour accommodates up to 12 participants, providing a comfortable and awe-inspiring Northern Lights experience.

name: The Wine Taster
summary: Exquisite wines, scenic views, exclusive barrel tastings,  and much more
description: Indulge in a 5-day journey through California's renowned wine country, perfect for connoisseurs and casual enthusiasts alike. Begin at Beringer Vineyards, one of Napa Valley's oldest wineries, offering historic architecture and exquisite tastings. Proceed to Clos Pegase Winery & Tasting Room, known for its artistic approach to winemaking and stunning estate grounds. Conclude at Raymond Vineyard and Cellar, celebrated for its dynamic winemaking techniques and immersive experiences.
